name: Chicken Farm VR For Upper Limb Muscles
name_original: Chicken Farm VR For Upper Limb Muscles
description:
Hello, I am a Japanese indie VR developer :) I created the Chicken Farm VR Game to train the Upper Limb Muscles while sitting for rehabilitation purpose.

[Attributes]

Music : https://www.bensound.com
Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

& Free Assets from Unity Asset Store

-------

This VR game requires the Arm Movements such as ... 

- Up and Down (Feeding Chickens and Chicks)

-Side to Side (Sorting Chickens and Chicks)

-Bend and Stretch (Collecting Eggs)

With Cute Chicks and Chickens.

-------

Target : Rehabilitation after stroke

Who need task-oriented exercises that require the use of the paralyzed hand.

I would like to help those exercises to be done in a more relaxing, fun, and imaginary environment.

-------

What’s Unique?

In addition to repeating the arm movement experience,

-A fun and relaxing environment
-No trigger, just touch!

-------

Future Update

-Movement Instruction to make sure the player uses the right muscle. 

-Saving result function to let the player know how much he/she has improved. 

-Hand Tracking for those who cannot grab the controller to play VR games.

-------

Thank you for reading and I look forward to your feedback!
